resources.string: Requested permissions are necessary to use this application. Try again later
Phone Number\nEnter your 11 digit phone number\ni.e. 03123456789
Email\nEnter your email in a valid format\nie. abc@zyz.com
Password\nPassword should be atleast 6 characters long
New Password\nPassword should be atleast 6 characters long
Jazz Cash ID\nEnter your 7 characters jazz cash ID
NIC Number\nEnter your 13 digits NIC Number\ni.e. 1234567891234
License Number\nEnter your 8 characters license number\ni.e. 83js2345
Date Of Birth\nYou must be atleast 18 years old to register
Plate Number\nPlate number should have a valid format\ni.e. ABC-1234
Vehicle Name\nEnter the vehicle name\ni.e. Toyota Corolla
